column4: I want to upgrade ubuntu to 12.10. But I don't want to install all the softwares again. Is it possible?
thats why its called an upgrade and not a reinstall ;-)
So I dont have to install my current softwares?

everything you installed via the ubuntu repositories should just be upgraded in the process. you get a warning about packaged that are not supported anymore (not many, wont matter most likely) and stuff you installed your self you have to take care yourself
